ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Low use of threads when performing deep crawls
ygData.msgSnippet: I think there is still a Host Valence  1 bug !! I have experienced that some crawls never end using Host Valence  1 - I don t know if it has anything to do

I think there is still a "Host Valence > 1" bug !!
I have experienced that some crawls never end using Host Valence > 1 - I 
don't know if it has anything to do with your problem or if this bug has 
been fixed !

Bjarne Andersen

Niklas Vargensten skrev:

>I have set the host valence to 10 and the number of toe threads to 30, and am
>crawling a single huge site. But the number of active threads rarely exceeds
>more than a handful, and most of the time the number of active threads is 0.
>
>It this simply a configuration problem, or simply due to the fact that
>Heritrix was designed with the intent of crawling several different domains
>at once, and not single hosts?
>/ Niklas
